description: This table contains information related to anticoagulation monitoring encounters. The following columns apply only when using the calendar tracking navigator section (LVN 617) for the anticoagulation encounter: AC_NO_DOSE_GIVEN_YN and AC_NO_INR_YN. There is a related table, EPI_ANTICOAG, for the most recent anticoagulation episode information.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number for this contact. This number is unique across all patient encounters in your system. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: PAT_ENC_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: AC_NO_DOSE_GIVEN_YN
columns.description:
Tracks if the "Patient was not given dosing instructions" was selected in an anticoagulation encounter.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: AC_NO_INR_YN
columns.description:
Tracks if "No INR" was selected for dosing in an anticoagulation encounter


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: AC_NO_DOSE_GIVEN_YN

columns.name: PERCENTAGE_TTR
columns.description: The patient's time in therapeutic range (TTR).

columns.name: TTR_END_DATE
columns.description: The end date used when TTR was calculated.

columns.name: TTR_START_DATE
columns.description: The start date used for TTR calculation.

columns.name: TTR_DAYS_ON_THERAPY
columns.description: Number of days of therapy considered for TTR calculation.

columns.name: AC_LINKED_ADM_PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: This items contains the CSN for the linked admission whose discharge instructions we are saving this to encounter

columns.name: EPISODE_RETURN_DATE
columns.description: Tracks the return date set in the episode at the time of linking to the encounter

columns.name: AC_SYNCED_ORDER_ID
columns.description: Tracks the order ID most recently synced to the anticoagulation tracking calendar
